Title: The Bucket List
Actors: Jack Nicholson, Morgan Freeman, Sean Hayes, Beverly Todd
Plot: Corporate billionaire Edward Cole and working class mechanic Carter Chambers have nothing in common except for their terminal illnesses. While sharing a hospital room together, they decide to leave it and do all the things they have ever wanted to do before they die according to their bucket list. In the process, both of them heal each other, become unlikely friends, and ultimately find joy in life.
Production: Warner Bros., Two Ton Films, Storyline Entertainment
